hero.title: Escape to Nature's Embrace
hero.subtitle: A mindful retreat in Matheran's no-car eco zone

welcome.title: Welcome to Horseland
welcome.description: Nestled in the heart of Matheran's car-free paradise, Horseland represents more than comfortable accommodation—it's a sanctuary where sustainable elegance meets authentic mountain hospitality.

noiseEscape.title: Zero-noise hill station escape
noiseEscape.description: Complete tranquility away from city chaos

wholesome.title: Wholesome buffets, thoughtfully prepared to avoid waste
wholesome.description: Sustainable dining with locally sourced ingredients

matheran.title: Why Matheran?
matheran.description: India's first eco-sensitive hill station offers a unique blend of heritage and nature, creating an unparalleled mountain escape experience.

stay.title: Your Perfect Stay
stay.description: Thoughtfully designed accommodations that blend comfort with nature's tranquility. Each room tells a story of comfort, elegance, and natural beauty - find accommodation that matches your mountain getaway dreams

undecided.title: Can't decide? We'll help you choose!
undecided.description: Call us for personalized recommendations based on your needs and budget.

romantic.title: Romantic Retreat
romantic.description: Intimate escapes with candlelit dinners, couple spa treatments, and scenic views

family.title: Family Adventure
family.description: Fun-filled activities for all ages with spacious accommodations and kid-friendly amenities

corporate.title: Corporate Getaway
corporate.description: Team building activities and conference facilities in a serene mountain setting

adventure.title: Adventure Seeker
adventure.description: Action-packed itinerary for adventure enthusiasts with thrilling outdoor activities

experiences.title: Curated
experiences.subtitle: Every moment at Horseland is thoughtfully designed to create lasting memories

activities.title: Mountain Adventures
activities.subtitle: Embrace the Wild
activities.description: From horseback rides along red-earth trails to guided forest walks and heritage toy train journeys, discover Matheran's natural wonders through curated adventures.

dining.title: Culinary Excellence
dining.subtitle: Buffet Only, Cooked with Purpose
dining.description: Our zero-waste kitchen philosophy meets gourmet excellence. Savor locally-sourced ingredients transformed into memorable dining experiences with panoramic mountain views.

wellness.title: Spa & Wellness
wellness.subtitle: Rejuvenate Your Soul
wellness.description: Ancient Ayurvedic traditions meet modern wellness techniques in our mountain spa. Experience therapeutic treatments designed to restore balance and vitality.

reviews.title: What Our
reviews.subtitle: See why families and couples choose Horseland for their Matheran stay and hear from travelers who found their perfect mountain escape at Horseland

cta.title: Join Our Happy Guests
cta.description: Continue to read more stories on TripAdvisor 4.8/5 and Google Reviews 4.9/5 or Book your stay today and create your own memorable experience in Matheran.

footer.description: Where the forest whispers you awake. Experience mindful comfort in Matheran's pristine car-free sanctuary.

newsletter.title: Mountain Mailers
newsletter.subtitle: Musings from the mountains, delivered monthly
